Package org.projecthaystack.auth

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AuthClientContext  
    AuthMsg
    AuthMsg models a scheme name and set of parameters according to RFC 7235.
    AuthScheme
    AuthScheme is the base class for modeling pluggable authentication algorithms.
    BasicScheme
    BasicScheme
    Folio2Scheme
    Folio2Scheme implements clinet side legacy 2.1 authentication for SkySpark.
    HmacScheme
    HmacScheme implements old HMAC SHA-1 algorithm.
    ScramScheme
    ScramScheme implements the salted challenge response authentication mechanism as defined in RFC 5802
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    AuthException
    AuthException is thrown by the authentication framework if an error occurs while trying to authenticat a user.
